welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sapporo! Get ready to experience the charming blend of modernity and tradition, as well as the city's famous beer, snow festival, and beautiful parks. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Sapporo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Donguri (どんぐり)
restaurants.description: Donguri (どんぐり) is a bakery located in 札幌市.
restaurants.address: 中央区大通西1-13 (ル・トロワ 1F), 札幌市, 北海道, 060-0001
